name: Shopping Ecommerce Web App
description: Crafted a MERN Stack E-commerce application with TypeScript, integrating user-friendly product management and secure authentication processes.

name: Travel Guide web app
description: Travel is a public repository by hritvikgupta, built with React, that simulates an online Location, Hotel and resturants search. Explore the codebase to learn more.

name: Ecommerce Web-App
description: Shopping-cart is a public repository by hritvikgupta, built with React, that simulates an online shopping experience. Explore the codebase to learn more.

name: Task Tracking website
description: Task-Traker is a robust React application offering a sleek user interface for task management. It features interactive development, testing, and production modes for optimal performance

name: Todo List Application
description: To-Do-List, an Android app, simplifies task management with reminders and notifications. It uses MVVM architecture and elements like Room Database and Navigation Component. Compatible with Android 10+

name: Whats App Clone
description: WhatsApp Clone JetpackCompose is a Kotlin-based replication of WhatsApp, featuring chat, voice messages, calls, profile updates, and sync. Built with HILT, Firebase, Navigation Controller, and Jetpack Compose.
